snippet: An explosion took place deep inside a military base near Tehran, where Iran produces key elements of its missiles and other munitions.
abstract: Explosion takes place deep inside a military base near Tehran, where Iran produces key elements of its missiles and other munitions; questions are raised about whether blast is accident or sabotage.
lead_paragraph: An explosion took place deep inside a military base near Tehran, where Iran produces key elements of its missiles and other munitions.

headline.main: Explosion at Key Military Base in Iran Raises Questions About Sabotage
headline.print_headline: Explosion at Key Military Base in Iran Raises Questions About Sabotage
